tracks.text: An old man lies in a hospital bed, his arm connected to a red hanging bag. He's watched by bassist Krist Novoselic, drummer Dave Grohl, and front man Kurt Cobain. The band members sit in red chairs.
The old man stands in a field of red poppies. He's naked, but for a loin cloth and a santa hat. The man, nothing but skin and bones, reaches down to the poppies.
The old man walks through the poppy field, up to a wooden, misshapen cross. 3 crows perch on the cross. The old man climbs a ladder up to the cross.

The ladder gone, the old man is held on the cross by ropes. The crows peck at him mechanically. The man looks tired, and his silver blond, shoulder-length hair is unkempt. He briefly looks at us with piercing blue eyes.
The band plays instruments in front of the cross, without the old man. The mechanical crows watch on, as ropes dangle loose.
Cobain  wears a gray T shirt, a shiny silver jacket, and blue jeans covered in green patches. Novoselic wears a blue shirt and black pants. Grohl wears a black shirt and white pants.
Cobain sings to us, his face filling the screen. He has shoulder length blond hair and piercing blue eyes. As he sings, he grabs his face.
Crows caw along with 'Hey' and 'Wait'.
At the edge of the poppy field, a gnarled tree stands. A child wearing a white hood and robe looks up at the tree. Malformed baby dolls hang from the tree by nooses.
There is a forest of gnarled trees.

An overeweight woman stands in the poppy field. She has internal organs painted on her body, as if she were a living anatomical model. On her back are black wings. She reaches out towards the lynched baby dolls. She takes steps, but stays in place, as if she's on a hidden treadmill.
The child in the white hood jumps, reaching out towards the lynched dolls. They are too high up.
The old man is on the cross, now wearing a white Bishop's hat. The mechanical crows peck at his arms. The child in the white hood skips in the poppy field in front of him.
The child looks up at the man on the cross and jumps, unable to reach him.
The overweight woman stands on a path in the poppy field. In front of the forest, the band members play their instruments.
Cobain spins his shiny silver jacket over his head, and then shoves it in Novoselic's face.
The child, a young girl with blond hair that goes just below her shoulders, stares at us with piercing blue eyes.
The girl's white hood blows off of her head. A swarm of blue butterflies leads the flying hood to a puddle. After landing in the puddle, the hood turns black, then flies away.
The girl, in a black hood and robe, stands next to the hospital bed. The old man is hooked up to an IV. The IV bag is red, with a fetus floating in it.
Cobain sings to us. Behind him, Novoselic sits with his arm around Grohl. Behind them is white stars on a blue background.
Grohl puts his hand on Novoselic's hand on his shoulder.

The three band members stand inside a red box with white stars. The box is short enough that Grohl can place his whole palm on the top of the box. Above the box is a black heart shaped building with glowing white windows.
The band members dance in the now red box, which includes a night stand, lamp, and old mattress. Grohl sits on the mattress. Novoselic stands, pressing his head to the ceiling.
The girl in the white robe sits on the mattress, and looks inside an empty heart shaped chocolate box.
Grohl sits on the mattress, and shows the empty box to Novoselic. Cobain sings while rocking in an old, white, metal, rocking chair.
Novoselic, wearing a black T shirt and purple pants, plays a black bass.
Novoselic sits with his arm around Grohl.
Novoselic and Grohl sit further apart. Grohl wipes his eyes. Cobain finishes singing, sighs, and looks distant.
In the hospital room, Novoselic opens the gray curtains, letting in sunlight. Fade to white.
